creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund
description: Pair of chair covers of rose-red k'ossu with a design of peony sprays and phoenix medallions in shades of blue, pink, green, yellow, gold and olive-green woven with gold threads. Some painted details. Lining of coarse pink cotton.
medium: satin, silk, gold threads, cotton, pigments
title: Chair Cover, One of a Pair
